ygData.subject: Re: *KABONG* (was re: End of kiting...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehe. I just tested out CoD and DDD with a friend a couple of days ago. DDD (Horn) about 63 Dmg ( 3 tics) DDD (Sing) about 30 Dmg ( 3 tics) CoD (Mandolin)
ygData.messageBody:
Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> Okay - as Keith pointed out, that's the end of this thread, unless we can
> make it more Bard-related.
>
> Which reminds me, I had a question about one of our DoT's. Can anyone
> explain how much damage, and how, Chords of Dissonance deals out?

Hehe. I just tested out CoD and DDD with a friend a couple of days ago.

DDD (Horn) about 63 Dmg ( 3 tics)
DDD (Sing) about 30 Dmg ( 3 tics)

CoD (Mandolin) about 53 Dmg ( 3 tics)
CoD (Sing) about 25 Dmg ( 3 tics)

I was lvl 30,
String at 155,
Singing at 155,
Brass at 132.
Dex 131
Cha 114

I forgot to ask him how mutch AC he lost when i was playing DDD... will have to
check that out some other time.

--
Benoit St-Hilaire
bsthilai@...

"Tourists: have some fun with New York's hard-boiled cabbies. When you get to
your destination, say to your driver, 'Pay? I was hitchhiking.'"
-- David Letterman
